skill.name: pr-description-writer
skill.description: Generates comprehensive, reviewer-friendly PR descriptions with visual diagrams, summary tables, collapsible sections, and structured test plans. Optimized for readability without sacrificing detail.

skill.author: DiversioTeam

security_audit.summary: Prompt-based documentation skill with read-only git operations. Uses gh CLI for GitHub interactions. No code execution, no file writes beyond PR descriptions, no network calls from the skill itself.

content.user_title: Write comprehensive PR descriptions with visual formatting
content.value_statement: Writing clear PR descriptions takes significant time and effort. This skill automatically generates reviewer-friendly descriptions with diagrams, tables, and collapsible sections that help teams understand changes faster.
actual_capabilities: Gathers all git changes including uncommitted work and commits not yet pushed
Detects existing PRs and fetches their current details for updates
Generates markdown PR descriptions with visual elements
Creates summary tables for multi-feature PRs
Includes ASCII diagrams, Mermaid charts, and box diagrams
Provides collapsible file lists grouped by category
limitations: Requires GitHub CLI (gh) to be installed and authenticated
Does not modify code files, only generates description text
Cannot access private repositories without proper gh authentication
Output quality depends on git commit message quality

use_cases.title: Speed up PR creation
use_cases.description: Generate complete, well-formatted PR descriptions in seconds instead of spending minutes writing them manually.

use_cases.title: Improve review efficiency
use_cases.description: Get structured summaries, visual diagrams, and organized file lists that help understand changes faster.

use_cases.title: Enforce documentation standards
use_cases.description: Ensure every PR has consistent formatting with required sections like test plans and breaking changes.

prompt_templates.title: New PR description
prompt_templates.prompt: Use pr-description-writer to create a PR description for my current branch. Gather all changes including uncommitted work and generate a comprehensive description with visual formatting.

prompt_templates.title: Update existing PR
prompt_templates.prompt: Use pr-description-writer to update PR description for my current feature branch. Include any new commits since the last update.

prompt_templates.title: Large feature PR
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a detailed PR description using pr-description-writer for a feature branch with multiple related commits. Include a summary table for all features and visual diagrams for complex logic.

prompt_templates.title: Infrastructure changes
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a PR description using pr-description-writer for infrastructure changes. Include architecture diagrams and deployment steps.

- `auth/jwt.py` - Core token generation and validation logic

best_practices: Run the skill after all changes are staged to capture the complete picture
Review generated descriptions and add context-specific details when needed
Use the visual elements for complex flows and logic changes
anti_patterns: Running without uncommitted changes staged can result in incomplete descriptions
Skipping the visual diagrams reduces clarity for complex changes
Not verifying base branch detection can cause incorrect diffs

faq.question: Which platforms support this skill?
faq.answer: Claude Code, OpenAI Codex, and Claude Code CLI. Use gh CLI for GitHub operations on all platforms.

faq.question: What git state does this skill analyze?
faq.answer:: It analyzes committed changes from base branch, uncommitted staged changes, and unstaged changes.

faq.question: Does this skill write to my repository?
faq.answer: No, it only reads git state and updates GitHub PR descriptions via gh CLI.

faq.question: Is my authentication data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, authentication is handled by gh CLI. The skill only reads PR metadata through authenticated API calls.

faq.question: Why is my description missing some files?
faq.answer: Ensure all relevant changes are committed and staged. The skill cannot read uncommitted unstaged files.

faq.question: How is this different from GitHub templates?
faq.answer: This skill analyzes actual changes and generates custom descriptions dynamically. Templates require manual filling.
